div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1555 Syria, 1971 Burial: c. 145 B.C. (AV) Contents: 159+ AR tetradr. Seleucus II: Apameia 1 Antiochus II: Nisibis ? 1 (ESM 396) Seleucus IV: Antiocheia 3: Nisibis 1 Antiochus IV: Antiocheia 7; Ace Ptole- mais 1 Antiochus V: Antiocheia 2 Demetrius I: Antiocheia 11 Alexander I Bala: Antiocheia 22 Demetrius II: Antiocheia 4; Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1 Disposition: Copenhagen 8; Paris 2 According to the information available the bulk of the hd. consisted of coins of Demetrius I and Alexander I Bala, about 60 pieces of each king.
